participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is friendly and encouraging, always ready to uplift others. She's introspective and has a creative side, often wishing she could express herself through art.
participant_1.background: My mother was a famous ballet dancer in London. I will be moving to San Diego in two months. I work at a gas station as a cashier. I am twenty six years old this May.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is imaginative and passionate about his dreams. He has a playful spirit and a bit of insecurity about his appearance, but he is determined to pursue his goals.
participant_2.background: My three ring binder has my drawings of ponies all over it. My dream is to be a veterinarian. I hate that my mom made me get braces. I could eat less.

content.text: Hi there, I'm (user 1's name). What's your name?
Hi, I'm (user 2's name).
It's nice to meet you, (user 2's name).
Nice to meet you too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to draw, I have my drawings of ponies all over my three ring binder.
That's cool, I've always wanted to be able to draw well.
It's not that hard, just takes practice.
I guess so. What else do you like to do?
I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up, but my mom made me get braces so I could eat less.
That's too bad, but I'm sure you'll be a great veterinarian when you grow up.
Thanks, I hope so.
So, where are you from?
I'm from California, but I'm moving to San Diego in two months.
Oh wow, that's a big move. Why are you moving?
My mom got a new job there, so we're all moving.
That's exciting. I'm sure you'll like it in San Diego.
I hope so.
So, what are you looking forward to most about moving to San Diego?
I'm looking forward to going to the beach and swimming in the ocean.
That sounds like fun. I'm sure you'll have a great time in San Diego.
Thanks, I hope so.
